# netbox Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "netbox" {
  host       = "netbox.example.com"
  token      = "1234561246412fawfaw"
  tls_verify = false
}
```

### Required

- **tls_verify** (Boolean)

### Optional

- **host** (String)
- **token** (String)
